transcript:
Customer: Share karte hain bhai.
Executive: Hello, haan ji sir, Avnish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello IndiaMART.
Executive: IndiaMART IndiaMART sir. Kya issue tha sir aapko kya dikkat?
Customer: Sir, sir we have a stock limited showing out of stock.
Executive: Wait a minute sir.
Customer: Yeah please can you repeat the query sir?
Customer: Birofil see in our catalog stock limited showing Birofil product is showing out of stock. Birofil B I R O P I L Birofil.
Executive: Can you repeat again B I R O
Customer: B I R O P I L Birofil. Birofil.
Executive: Birofil.
Customer: Birofil B I R O P I L.
Executive: B I R O P I L Birofil product right?
Customer: That is showing out of stock but stock is available.
Executive: Wait a minute sir I can I can see sir. I can check sir.
Executive: Birofil product you have a stock but it is showing the out of stock right sir?
Customer: Yeah and the price also should price also can put as the price price you can put 2000 rupees.
Executive: Birofil.
Executive: So Birofil product is error in our catalog sir?
Customer: it is available you have to mention it's available and the price you have to mention 2000 rupees.
Executive: 2000 wait a minute sir.
Executive: 2000 rupees Birofil.
Customer: 2000 rupees 2000 only.
Executive: 2000 only.
Executive: Acha B I R O Birofil trap right?
Customer: B I R O P I L Birofil.
Executive: Yeah I can understand sir. B I R O P I L Birofil trap so you have a stock but there is showing out of stock right?
Customer: Yeah yeah that's.
Executive: Okay okay okay sir. I can correct sir I can check it then correct.
Customer: And please sir price also mention 2000 rupees.
Executive: Okay wait a minute sir.
Executive: Okay yeah.
Executive: Kya Birofil product ka price mention not mention sir I can mention 2000 rupees right sir?
Customer: Yeah yeah.
Executive: Per box 2000 per bottle sir?
Customer: 2000 rupees per bottle.
Executive: Per bottle. Okay.
Customer: And one more thing now there is one more product Sagra S P E G R A Sagra.
Executive: Wait a minute. Wait a minute sir.
Executive: Kya I can mention the price over here right sir?
Executive: Birofil.
Executive: And second product name is sir?
Customer: Sagra Sagra S P E G R A Sagra S P E G R A.
Executive: S P E G R A Kya Sagra.
Customer: The price you have to mention price is 2700.
Executive: 2700 wait a minute sir.
Executive: There is mention is 3000 rupees right sir?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: In your catalog in your catalog the price is mention 3000 rupees right I can mention 2700.
Customer: 2700 you can mention 27 2700.
Executive: 2700. Okay sir I can update the price sir.
Customer: Thank thank you.
Executive: And any other query sir can you tell me then I will correct sir yeah.
Customer: Thank thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Birofil product showing out of stock.

- Price of Birofil product to be updated.

- Price of Sagra product to be updated.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to correct the stock issue.

- Executive agreed to update the price.

- Executive agreed to update the price of Sagra.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- stock, price, catalog, birofil, sagra
